attributes.action: Reduce the 20% tax rate for pensioners
attributes.additional_details: It is appalling that all pensioners should be paying the same rate of tax as people that are working. Pensioners have a reduced income when they retire therefore should be paying less tax!!! The government must consider a 10% rate of tax for pensioners!!! Most pensioners fought in the war for this country...they're entitled to concessions don't you think?
